get.summary: Allows searching for universes.
get.description:
PoC of search endpoint which supports filters in search query string and special syntax for sorts.
IMPORTANT: filter names, values, sort values - are case sensitive!

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of results per request.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: The paging cursor for the previous or next page.

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description: The order the results are sorted in.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description:
A search query with filters seperated by whitespace. Example: "these are keywords! filterName:filterValue filterName:filterValue"

archived:[Value] (required: False)
Allowed values: [True,False]

active:[Value] (required: False)
Allowed values: [True,False]

creator:[Value] (required: True)
Allowed values: [User,Group,Team]

groups:[Value,Value,...] (required: False)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
Determines the way results will be sorted. Format: (a prefix for ascending or descending) + (sort type).

Ascending Prefix: +

Descending Prefix -

Allowed Sort Types: +GameCreated,-GameCreated,+GameName,-GameName,+RootPlaceName,-RootPlaceName,+RootPlaceUpdated,-RootPlaceUpdated,+LastUpdated,-LastUpdated

Note: An allowed type with no prefix allows both ascending and descending but if a prefix is specified only the specified order is allowed.

400.description:
'q' field value contains filter which value has a wrong format or is not in allowed values list.
or
'q' field value doesn't contain filter which is required.
or
'sort' field value has a wrong format or is not in allowed values list.

401.description: 0: Authorization has been denied for this request.

canManage.description: Determines whether or not consumer can manage the target universe

canCloudEdit.description:
Determines whether or not consumer can cloud the target universe
This is only nullable/optional in the context of https://develop.roblox.com/docs#!/Universes/get_v1_universes_universeId_context_permissions endpoint which is consumed only internally. It should be computed and set for all other usages.

canManage.description: Determines whether or not consumer can manage the target universe

canCloudEdit.description:
Determines whether or not consumer can cloud the target universe
This is only nullable/optional in the context of https://develop.roblox.com/docs#!/Universes/get_v1_universes_universeId_context_permissions endpoint which is consumed only internally. It should be computed and set for all other usages.

universeAvatarType.description: Which avatar types are allowed in the universe.

isForSale.description: Whether the game is offered for sale.

price.description: Price of the game, in Robux.

allowPrivateServers.description: If the universe allows the use of private servers.

privateServerPrice.description: The price to purchase a private server in robux.

universeBodyType.description: What avatar body types are allowed by the universe. ['Standard' = 1, 'PlayerChoice' = 2]

universeJointPositioningType.description: What avatar joint positioning is allowed by the universe. ['Standard' = 1, 'ArtistIntent' = 2]

isFriendsOnly.description: Whether game access is limited to friends for user-owned games or group members for group-owned games.

playableDevices.description: List of device types this game can be played on.

isForSale.description: Whether the game is offered for sale.

price.description: Price of the game, in Robux.

isStudioAccessToApisAllowed.description: Whether studio access to APIs is allowed or not.
